subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A track that held its first race in 1903 but did not have a major event last year will host an IndyCar race Sunday. Drivers say the facility’s rough edges are part of its charm.
snippet: A track that held its first race in 1903 but did not have a major event last year will host an IndyCar race Sunday. Drivers say the facility’s rough edges are part of its charm.
